name: Claude ToolKit - Custom Prompts | Chat Export, Voice | Notes & Folders
description: Claude ToolKit is a productivity extension designed to enhance the Claude AI chat interface by adding advanced organization and productivity tools. The extension allows users to create and manage custom prompts so frequently used instructions can be reused quickly. It provides a chat export feature that lets users save conversations into formats such as text or documents for later reference. Users can organize their work using folders and notes, making it easier to manage multiple conversations or projects. The extension also includes voice input capabilities so users can dictate prompts directly instead of typing. It integrates directly into the Claude interface and works alongside the existing chat system without modifying core functionality.

name: DeepSeek Pro - Custom Prompts | Chat Export, Voice | Themes & Folders
description: DeepSeek Pro extends the DeepSeek AI interface with additional features that improve workflow and organization. The extension provides a system for creating reusable custom prompts so users can quickly run repeated instructions. Conversations can be exported and saved for documentation or offline use. The extension supports folder-based organization so chats can be grouped by topic or project. A theme system allows users to customize the visual appearance of the interface for improved readability and personalization. Voice input functionality allows prompts to be entered through speech instead of typing. The extension integrates into the DeepSeek chat interface and adds tools for managing conversations without requiring external software.

name: Gemini Prime: 165+ Custom AI Prompts | Chat Export | Notes & Folders
description: Gemini Prime enhances the Gemini AI interface by providing a library of more than 165 predefined prompts designed for different tasks such as writing, coding, research, and productivity. Users can select prompts directly from the extension instead of manually typing instructions. The extension includes chat export functionality so conversations can be saved and reused later. Notes and folders allow users to organize prompts and conversations into structured collections. This makes it easier to manage multiple workflows or projects inside the Gemini interface. The extension integrates directly with Gemini and adds additional tools without changing the original AI system.

name: Sora Video Downloader - Save with One Click
description: Sora Video Downloader allows users to download videos from supported platforms with a single click. The extension detects available video files on a page and provides a download button directly in the browser interface. Users can save videos locally for offline viewing without needing additional software. The extension focuses on simplicity and provides a minimal interface so downloads can be performed quickly. It works automatically when a supported video page is opened and provides download options based on detected media streams.

name: AI Chat Exporter: Save ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini & Deepseek as PDF/TXT/WORD
description: AI Chat Exporter allows users to save conversations from multiple AI platforms including ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and DeepSeek. The extension adds export controls directly into the chat interface so users can download conversations without copying manually. Supported formats include PDF, Word documents, and plain text files. The extension preserves conversation structure so messages remain readable after export. Users can create offline records of AI discussions for documentation, research, or sharing purposes. The extension works directly inside supported AI websites and automatically detects conversations available for export.

name: WA Group Finder - Find WhatsApp groups
description: WA Group Finder helps users discover public WhatsApp groups by searching for group links across different websites. The extension collects and displays available WhatsApp invite links so users can quickly find communities related to specific topics. Users can browse groups and open invite links directly from the extension interface. The tool is designed to simplify the process of locating WhatsApp groups without manually searching through multiple websites. It acts as a directory system that aggregates group links in one place.

name: Web2PDF - HTML to PDF Converter
description: Web2PDF allows users to convert web pages into PDF documents directly from the browser. The extension captures the content of the current page and generates a PDF version that can be downloaded locally. Users can save articles, documentation, or online content for offline reading or sharing. The extension works on most websites and preserves page layout so the PDF resembles the original page. The conversion process is handled inside the browser and does not require external tools or services.

name: Mobile View Tester: Responsive Web Design Tool
description: Mobile View Tester is a browser extension that allows developers and designers to preview websites in multiple screen sizes without using external tools. The extension provides a set of predefined device dimensions so users can simulate how a website appears on mobile phones and tablets. Users can switch between different resolutions and orientations to evaluate responsive layouts. The extension loads the current webpage inside a resizable frame and allows quick comparison between desktop and mobile views. This helps developers test layout behavior, spacing, and responsiveness during development. The tool works directly inside the browser and eliminates the need to manually resize the window or open developer tools repeatedly.

name: FullPageScreenshot - Custom Screenshots & Advanced Editor
description: FullPageScreenshot allows users to capture screenshots of web pages either as full-page captures or selected areas. The extension scrolls automatically to capture the entire page including content outside the visible screen. Users can also capture custom regions by selecting a specific area. After capturing, the extension opens an editing interface where users can annotate screenshots with shapes, text, highlights, and drawings. Screenshots can be exported in multiple formats including PNG, JPEG, and PDF. The extension is designed to support documentation, tutorials, and bug reporting by providing both capture and editing tools in one workflow.

name: LeadSpry - b2b Lead Generation Tool
description: LeadSpry is a lead generation extension designed to collect contact information from websites and online platforms. The extension scans web pages and extracts available data such as email addresses, phone numbers, and profile details. Users can gather business leads while browsing without manually copying information. The extension is intended for freelancers, marketers, and sales teams who need to collect potential client information. Extracted data can be organized and exported for further use. LeadSpry works across multiple types of websites and provides a simplified interface for collecting leads directly from browser sessions.

name: Web Highlighter Pro: Smart Folders, Notes & Research Assistant
description: Web Highlighter Pro allows users to highlight text on web pages and save those highlights for later reference. The extension stores highlighted content along with notes so users can organize research material while browsing. Highlights can be grouped into folders which makes it easier to manage information across multiple topics. Users can return to saved highlights and quickly reopen the original pages. The extension acts as a research assistant by helping users collect and organize information directly from websites without copying content into separate documents.

name: YouTube Stats Viewer - Likes, Dislikes & Engagement
description: YouTube Stats Viewer provides detailed metrics for YouTube videos by displaying engagement information directly on the video page. The extension calculates and shows values such as like ratio, total likes, dislikes, and engagement indicators. Users can quickly evaluate video performance without manually calculating statistics. The extension adds a visual panel near the video interface and updates metrics automatically when a new video is opened. It is useful for creators and analysts who want to understand audience interaction with videos.

name: ImageXtract - Copy Text from Image
description: ImageXtract is an OCR extension that allows users to extract text from images directly inside the browser. Users can upload images or select areas of a webpage to capture screenshots for text extraction. The extension processes the image and converts detected text into editable content that can be copied to the clipboard. It supports extracting text from screenshots, photos, scanned documents, and online images. The extension includes cropping tools so users can select only the area containing text. The extracted text can be used in documents or other applications without manual typing. The tool works entirely within the browser and is designed for quick text extraction tasks.

name: Phone number Extractor & Email Finder
description: Phone Number Extractor and Email Finder scans web pages and automatically detects contact information such as phone numbers and email addresses. The extension identifies patterns commonly used for contact details and lists the results in a structured format. Users can collect contact data without manually searching through page content. Extracted information can be copied or saved for later use. The extension is useful for collecting publicly available contact information from websites and directories while browsing.

name: OmniSearch Plus - ChatGPT, Claude, YouTube, Bing Search Bar
description: OmniSearch Plus provides a unified search bar that allows users to quickly search multiple platforms from a single interface. The extension adds a search input inside the browser where users can type a query and choose a target platform such as ChatGPT, Claude, YouTube, or Bing. Instead of opening each service manually, the extension redirects the search query directly to the selected platform. This reduces the time required to switch between different websites when performing research or looking for information. The tool is designed for users who frequently search across AI platforms and search engines. The extension works as a simple launcher that converts typed queries into platform-specific searches.

name: Custom Screensaver - HD Videos & Images
description: Custom Screensaver allows users to display images or videos as a browser-based screensaver when the system is idle. The extension lets users select media content that will be shown automatically after a period of inactivity. Screensavers can include HD images or video files depending on user preferences. The extension runs inside the browser and activates when no activity is detected. Users can personalize their browsing environment by displaying visual content such as wallpapers or animations. The extension focuses on customization and allows users to control the type of media and the behavior of the screensaver.

name: SEO CheckUp: Improve Rankings with Detailed Audits
description: SEO CheckUp analyzes web pages and provides a technical overview of search engine optimization factors. The extension scans the current page and evaluates elements such as titles, meta descriptions, headings, images, and links. It provides a structured report that helps users understand how well a page follows SEO best practices. Users can review issues such as missing tags, incorrect heading structures, and other technical problems. The extension helps developers and website owners inspect optimization details without using external SEO tools. The analysis is performed directly on the active page and results are shown in a simple report interface.

name: MainTab - Save Memory & Manage Tabs
description: MainTab is a tab management extension that allows users to organize and store browser tabs in groups. Users can save currently open tabs into named collections so they can be reopened later without keeping them active in memory. This helps reduce browser resource usage when many tabs are open. Saved tab groups can be restored at any time with a single click. Users can create multiple groups for different projects or tasks and rename them for easier identification. The extension also provides options to export saved tabs so they can be backed up or shared. MainTab helps users manage large numbers of tabs without losing important pages.

name: CSS Scanly - Copy CSS | Tailwind & Bootstrap
description: CSS Scanly is a developer tool that allows users to inspect and copy CSS properties from elements on any webpage. The extension activates a scanning mode where users can hover over elements to view applied styles in real time. It displays computed CSS values and identifies classes used by frameworks such as Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap. Users can copy CSS properties directly from the interface and use them in their own projects. The extension also supports editing styles temporarily so users can test design changes without modifying the original website. Multiple style panels can be pinned for comparison between elements. CSS Scanly helps developers analyze layouts and reuse styling information efficiently.

name: Filtered Youtube - Remove YouTube Recommended & Shorts
description: Filtered YouTube modifies the YouTube interface to remove distracting elements and create a focused viewing environment. The extension can hide recommended videos, Shorts sections, comments, and other interface components that often lead to distraction. Users can customize which elements should be hidden based on their preferences. The extension works automatically when YouTube pages are opened and removes selected elements from the layout. This allows users to watch videos or study content without being influenced by recommendations or unnecessary sections. The extension is designed for users who want a simplified and distraction-free YouTube experience.

name: Zoomflow – Auto Zoom Screen Recorder & Editor
description: Zoomflow is a screen recording extension designed for creating demonstration and tutorial videos directly in the browser. The extension records screen activity and automatically applies zoom effects to highlight important areas during recording. This allows viewers to clearly see interactions without manual editing. After recording, users can review and export videos without needing external editing software. The extension is intended for creating product demos, tutorials, and instructional videos quickly. Zoomflow simplifies the process by combining recording and automatic visual enhancement into a single workflow.

name: NotePilot-Substack Notes Scheduler, Bookmarks, Analytics
description: NotePilot is a productivity extension designed for managing and scheduling Substack Notes. The extension allows users to create notes and schedule them for automatic posting at selected times. Users can save and organize notes as bookmarks so they can be reused or edited later. The extension also provides analytics that help users track the performance of published notes. Users can manage multiple notes in one place instead of manually posting content. NotePilot integrates directly into the Substack interface and adds scheduling and management capabilities that are not available by default. The extension helps content creators plan posts and maintain consistent publishing without needing external scheduling tools.

name: Upload Instagram Stories & Download Reels, Posts ,Stories - StoryFlow
description: StoryFlow provides tools for uploading Instagram stories from a desktop browser and downloading Instagram content for offline use. The extension allows users to upload images or videos as stories without using a mobile device. It also detects Instagram media and provides download options for reels, posts, and stories. Users can save content locally without needing additional software. The extension integrates with the Instagram website and adds controls for uploading and downloading content directly from the browser interface. It simplifies content management for users who prefer working on desktop instead of mobile devices.

name: Custom Labels & Colors for Calendar
description: Custom Labels and Colors for Calendar allows users to personalize calendar events by assigning custom labels and color categories. The extension enhances the calendar interface by adding visual identifiers that help distinguish different types of events. Users can assign colors and labels based on categories such as work, personal tasks, meetings, or reminders. This makes it easier to visually organize schedules and quickly identify event types. The extension works directly inside the calendar interface and adds additional customization options beyond the default calendar features.

name: Chat with Ai (gpt ,grok ,claude,gemini)
description: Chat with AI provides a simple interface for interacting with multiple AI models from a single extension. Users can send prompts to supported AI services such as GPT-based models, Grok, Claude, and Gemini without switching between different websites. The extension acts as a centralized chat interface where users can enter questions and receive responses from different AI providers. This reduces the need to open multiple tabs when working with AI tools. The extension focuses on providing a unified environment for interacting with different AI systems through a single interface.

name: Crypto Tracker – Bitcoin Price Tracker & Crypto Market
description: Crypto Tracker provides real-time cryptocurrency price information directly inside the browser. The extension displays price updates for Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies and allows users to monitor market movements without visiting trading websites. Users can quickly check price values and track market changes while browsing. The extension focuses on providing simple and accessible market information rather than advanced trading features. It serves as a lightweight tool for monitoring cryptocurrency prices from the browser interface.

name: TikTok Auto Follow Scroll, Like, Save – TokMaster
description: TokMaster automates interactions on TikTok by performing actions such as scrolling videos, following accounts, liking content, and saving videos. The extension runs automated actions based on user settings and interacts with the TikTok interface automatically. Users can configure the automation to perform repetitive tasks without manual interaction. The extension works directly on the TikTok website and simulates user actions within the browser. It is designed to reduce manual effort when interacting with large amounts of content.

name: Blur Screen - Sensitive Data Protection
description: Blur Screen allows users to hide sensitive information on web pages by applying blur effects to selected areas. The extension enables users to manually blur parts of the screen where confidential information is displayed. This helps protect private data when sharing screens, recording videos, or working in public environments. Users can apply and remove blur effects as needed. The extension works directly on web pages and allows flexible control over which areas are hidden. It is useful for protecting personal or confidential information during presentations or recordings.

name: Image Converter
description: Image Converter allows users to convert images between different formats directly inside the browser. Users can upload images and select an output format such as JPG, PNG, WebP, or other supported formats. The conversion process happens in the browser so files are not uploaded to external servers. This tool helps users quickly change image formats for compatibility with websites, applications, or devices. Users can download converted images immediately after processing. The interface is simple and designed for fast conversion without requiring additional configuration. The tool works on desktop and mobile browsers and supports single image processing.

name: JPG to PNG Converter
description: JPG to PNG Converter allows users to convert JPEG images into PNG format directly in the browser. Users can upload JPG images and convert them into PNG files without installing software. The conversion process preserves image quality and produces files that support transparency where applicable. The tool is useful when PNG format is required for design or development tasks. Processing is performed locally in the browser and images are not transmitted to external servers. Converted files can be downloaded immediately after conversion.

name: PNG to JPG Converter
description: PNG to JPG Converter converts PNG images into JPEG format directly inside the browser. Users upload PNG images and receive JPG files optimized for smaller file size. The tool removes transparency when converting images and replaces transparent areas with a solid background. The conversion is performed locally without uploading images to servers. This tool is useful for reducing file size and improving compatibility with websites or applications that require JPG images. Converted files can be downloaded immediately after processing.

name: WebP to JPG Converter
description: WebP to JPG Converter converts WebP images into JPG format for compatibility with applications that do not support WebP. Users upload WebP images and convert them into standard JPEG files directly in the browser. The tool processes images locally and does not upload files to external servers. Converted images can be downloaded immediately after processing. This tool is useful when working with software or platforms that require JPG images instead of WebP format.

name: HEIC to JPG Converter
description: HEIC to JPG Converter allows users to convert HEIC images into JPG format inside the browser. HEIC images created by mobile devices can be uploaded and converted into standard JPEG files. The conversion process runs locally and does not require uploading files to servers. Converted images are compatible with most software and devices. This tool helps users work with HEIC images on systems that do not support the format. Converted files can be downloaded immediately after processing.

name: SVG Converter
description: SVG Converter allows users to convert SVG vector graphics into raster image formats such as PNG or JPG. Users upload SVG files and choose an output format and resolution. The tool renders the vector graphic and produces an image file that can be used in documents or websites. The conversion process happens locally in the browser without uploading files. This tool is useful when vector graphics need to be converted into standard image formats for compatibility or sharing.

name: Image to PDF Converter
description: Image to PDF Converter allows users to combine one or more images into a PDF document. Users can upload images and arrange them before generating the PDF file. The tool converts images into pages within a single PDF document and preserves image quality. Processing is performed inside the browser and files are not uploaded to servers. The generated PDF can be downloaded immediately after creation. This tool is useful for creating documents from scanned images or photos.

name: PDF to JPG Converter
description: PDF to JPG Converter converts PDF pages into JPG images directly in the browser. Users upload a PDF file and the tool extracts pages and converts them into image files. Each page can be downloaded as a separate image. Processing occurs locally and files are not uploaded to external servers. This tool is useful for extracting visual content from PDF documents and converting pages into images for sharing or editing.

name: PDF to PNG Converter
description: PDF to PNG Converter converts PDF pages into PNG images directly inside the browser. Users upload PDF files and the tool renders each page into a PNG image. Processing happens locally without sending files to servers. PNG images preserve quality and are useful for design or documentation purposes. Converted images can be downloaded after processing. This tool helps users extract images from PDF files in a lossless format.

name: Image Resizer
description: Image Resizer allows users to change image dimensions directly inside the browser. Users can upload images and specify width and height values. The tool can maintain the original aspect ratio or allow custom resizing. The resizing process runs locally without uploading images to external servers. Resized images can be downloaded immediately after processing. This tool is useful for preparing images for websites, social media, or applications that require specific dimensions.

name: Image Cropper
description: Image Cropper allows users to select and extract specific areas from images directly inside the browser. Users can upload an image and manually adjust a cropping frame to isolate the desired portion. The tool supports precise cropping by dragging edges and corners of the selection area. Once the crop area is selected, the tool generates a new image containing only the chosen region. The cropping process runs locally in the browser without uploading files to servers. Cropped images can be downloaded immediately after processing. This tool is useful for removing unwanted parts of images and preparing visuals for documents, social media, or web content.

name: Image Compressor
description: Image Compressor reduces the file size of images while maintaining acceptable visual quality. Users can upload images and apply compression to produce smaller files suitable for websites or storage. The tool processes images locally in the browser so files are not uploaded to external servers. Compression helps reduce loading time and storage requirements while preserving the original appearance as much as possible. After processing, compressed images can be downloaded immediately. This tool is useful for optimizing images for faster web performance and efficient storage.

name: WebP Compressor
description: WebP Compressor reduces the file size of WebP images directly inside the browser. Users upload WebP files and the tool applies compression to produce smaller image files. The compression process balances quality and file size and is performed locally without sending images to external servers. Compressed images can be downloaded immediately after processing. This tool helps users optimize WebP images for faster loading and reduced storage usage while maintaining visual quality.

name: PNG Compressor
description: PNG Compressor reduces the size of PNG image files by applying optimization techniques directly in the browser. Users upload PNG images and receive compressed versions that require less storage space. The compression process is performed locally and images are not uploaded to servers. The tool preserves image quality while minimizing file size. Compressed images can be downloaded after processing. This tool is useful for preparing images for websites or applications where smaller file sizes are important.

name: JPEG Compressor
description: JPEG Compressor reduces the file size of JPEG images by applying adjustable compression inside the browser. Users upload JPEG files and receive compressed images that are smaller in size. The compression process runs locally without transmitting files to external servers. The tool is useful for reducing storage usage and improving website loading speed. Compressed images can be downloaded immediately after processing. Users can optimize multiple images individually for better performance.

name: GIF Compressor
description: GIF Compressor reduces the file size of animated GIF files directly inside the browser. Users upload GIF files and the tool applies compression to produce smaller files suitable for sharing or uploading. The compression process occurs locally without uploading files to external servers. Compressed GIF files maintain animation while reducing storage size. The tool helps users optimize animated images for websites or messaging platforms.

name: Color Picker
description: Color Picker allows users to select and identify colors directly from the screen or uploaded images. The tool displays color values in multiple formats such as HEX and RGB. Users can copy color values for use in design or development projects. The interface provides a visual color selection area and allows precise color identification. The tool works inside the browser and does not require external software. It is useful for designers and developers who need accurate color values.

name: Base64 Image Converter
description: Base64 Image Converter converts image files into Base64 encoded strings directly in the browser. Users upload images and the tool generates encoded text that represents the image data. The encoded string can be copied and used in HTML or CSS files where embedded images are required. The conversion process happens locally without sending files to servers. This tool is useful for embedding images directly into web documents without separate image files.

name: Video Compressor
description: Video Compressor reduces the size of video files by applying compression directly inside the browser. Users upload video files and receive compressed versions that require less storage space. The tool processes videos locally and does not upload files to external servers. Compressed videos can be downloaded immediately after processing. The tool is useful for reducing file sizes before uploading videos to websites or sharing them online.

name: Emoji Generator
description: Emoji Generator allows users to create emoji-style graphics using customizable options. Users can generate emoji images by selecting shapes, colors, and expressions. Generated emojis can be downloaded and used in messages, documents, or designs. The tool works entirely in the browser and does not require external software. It provides a simple interface for generating graphical emoji content quickly.

name: Gradient Generator
description: Gradient Generator allows users to create CSS gradient backgrounds using a visual interface inside the browser. Users can select multiple colors and adjust gradient direction to generate linear gradients. The tool displays a live preview so users can see the gradient result while adjusting settings. It automatically generates CSS code that can be copied and used in websites or applications. The tool simplifies the process of designing gradients without manually writing CSS. All operations happen inside the browser and no data is uploaded to servers. Generated gradients can be immediately used in design and development projects.

name: Video to Audio Converter
description: Video to Audio Converter extracts audio tracks from video files directly inside the browser. Users upload video files and the tool processes the media to generate an audio-only file. The conversion process runs locally without uploading files to servers. Users can download the extracted audio after processing. The tool is useful for extracting music, podcasts, or spoken content from video recordings. It provides a simple interface that allows quick conversion without installing software.

name: Image to Text (OCR)
description: Image to Text is an OCR-based tool that extracts text from images directly inside the browser. Users upload images or screenshots and the tool analyzes the content to detect readable text. The extracted text is converted into editable format that can be copied or saved. The OCR process supports multiple languages and runs locally in the browser without sending images to external servers. This tool is useful for digitizing printed documents, extracting text from screenshots, and converting scanned images into editable text. The interface includes options for uploading images and copying results after processing.

name: QR Code Generator
description: QR Code Generator allows users to create QR codes from text, links, or other input data directly inside the browser. Users enter content such as URLs or messages and the tool generates a QR code image representing the data. Generated QR codes can be downloaded and shared. The tool works entirely inside the browser without sending information to external servers. It is useful for creating QR codes for websites, contact details, or printed materials.

name: Base64 Converter
description: Base64 Converter allows users to encode text into Base64 format and decode Base64 strings back into readable text. Users can paste input text and perform encoding or decoding instantly. The conversion process runs entirely inside the browser and does not transmit data to servers. This tool is useful for developers working with encoded data in web applications. The interface provides quick conversion between plain text and Base64 format.

name: CSS Minifier
description: CSS Minifier compresses CSS code by removing unnecessary characters such as spaces and line breaks. Users can paste CSS code and receive a minimized version that is smaller in size. The tool helps improve website performance by reducing stylesheet file size. Processing occurs locally in the browser and code is not transmitted to servers. Minified CSS can be copied and used directly in projects.

name: URL Encoder Decoder
description: URL Encoder Decoder converts text into URL-safe encoded format and decodes encoded strings back into normal text. Users can paste input values and perform encoding or decoding instantly. The tool works entirely inside the browser and does not send data to external servers. It is useful for preparing URLs that contain special characters and for decoding encoded parameters.

name: Password Generator
description: Password Generator creates random passwords with customizable length and character types. Users can generate passwords containing letters, numbers, and symbols. The generated passwords can be copied and used for secure accounts. The tool runs entirely in the browser and does not transmit generated passwords to servers. It provides a quick way to create strong passwords without manual effort.

name: Text Diff Checker
description: Text Diff Checker compares two blocks of text and highlights differences between them. Users paste original and modified text into separate fields and the tool identifies added, removed, or changed content. The comparison process runs locally in the browser without sending text to servers. This tool is useful for reviewing document changes and identifying modifications between versions.

name: Phone Number Generator
description: Phone Number Generator creates random phone numbers based on selected formats or regions. Users can generate multiple numbers at once and copy them for testing or demonstration purposes. Generated numbers follow typical phone number patterns but are not assigned to real users. The tool works entirely in the browser and does not require external services. It is useful for software testing and form validation.

name: Lorem Ipsum Generator
description: Lorem Ipsum Generator creates placeholder text for design and layout purposes. Users can generate paragraphs or sentences of dummy text and copy them into projects. The generated text helps designers and developers fill content areas while building layouts. The tool runs entirely inside the browser and produces text instantly.

name: Comma Separator
description: Comma Separator formats lists of values by adding or removing commas between items. Users can paste text containing multiple values and convert it into a comma-separated format. The tool processes text locally in the browser and does not transmit data to servers. It is useful for formatting lists for spreadsheets or programming tasks.

name: Random Name Generator
description: Random Name Generator produces randomly generated names for testing or creative purposes. Users can generate multiple names instantly and copy them for use in projects or examples. The tool runs locally in the browser and does not require external data sources. It is useful for generating sample user data.

name: Markdown to HTML
description: Markdown to HTML converts Markdown formatted text into HTML code directly inside the browser. Users paste Markdown content and the tool generates equivalent HTML output. The conversion runs locally without sending data to external servers. Generated HTML can be copied and used in web projects. The tool simplifies the process of converting formatted text into web-ready code.

name: Word Counter
description: Word Counter analyzes text and provides counts of words and characters. Users paste or type text into the tool and statistics update automatically. The tool works locally inside the browser and does not transmit text to servers. It is useful for measuring text length and preparing content with specific limits.

name: Credit Card Generator
description: Credit Card Generator produces random credit card numbers for testing and development purposes. Users can generate numbers that follow standard card formatting and checksum rules without being linked to real financial accounts. The generated values are useful for software testing, form validation, and demonstration environments where realistic data is required. The generation process runs locally inside the browser and no data is transmitted to external servers. Users can generate multiple card numbers at once and copy them for use in development or testing scenarios.

name: JavaScript Minifier
description: JavaScript Minifier compresses JavaScript code by removing unnecessary spaces, comments, and formatting characters. Users can paste JavaScript code and receive a minimized version that reduces file size while preserving functionality. The minification process is performed entirely inside the browser without transmitting code to external servers. The tool helps developers optimize scripts for faster loading and reduced bandwidth usage. Minified code can be copied and used directly in web applications.

name: Word to PDF Converter
description: Word to PDF Converter allows users to convert Word documents into PDF format directly inside the browser. Users upload Word files and the tool generates a PDF version that preserves document layout and formatting. The conversion process is performed locally without uploading files to external servers. Generated PDF files can be downloaded immediately after processing. This tool is useful for sharing documents in a format that is widely supported across devices.

name: Unit Converter
description: Unit Converter converts values between different measurement units such as length, weight, temperature, and volume. Users enter a numeric value and select source and target units to perform conversion instantly. The conversion process runs locally inside the browser and does not require external services. This tool provides a simple interface for performing measurement conversions quickly without manual calculations.

name: Name Wheel Spinner
description: Name Wheel Spinner allows users to enter a list of names and select one randomly using a spinning wheel interface. Users add names to the list and start the spinner to randomly choose a result. The tool runs entirely inside the browser and does not store or transmit data. It is useful for random selection in games, decision making, or group activities.

name: Archive Converter
description: Archive Converter allows users to convert compressed archive files between supported formats. Users upload archive files and select an output format for conversion. The tool processes files inside the browser environment and generates converted archives for download. This tool is useful when working with archive formats that are not supported by certain applications or systems.

name: PDF to Word Converter
description: PDF to Word Converter converts PDF documents into editable Word files directly inside the browser. Users upload PDF files and receive Word documents that preserve text structure. The conversion process runs locally without uploading files to external servers. Converted files can be downloaded after processing. This tool helps users edit content originally stored in PDF format.

name: Email Extractor
description: Email Extractor scans input text and identifies email addresses automatically. Users paste text into the tool and it extracts valid email patterns into a structured list. The extraction process runs locally inside the browser and does not transmit data to servers. Extracted email addresses can be copied for further use. This tool is useful for collecting contact information from large text blocks or documents.

name: Phone Number Extractor
description: Phone Number Extractor scans text input and detects phone numbers automatically. Users paste content and the tool identifies number patterns commonly used for phone contacts. Extracted numbers are displayed in a structured list that can be copied. Processing happens locally in the browser without sending text to servers. This tool helps users collect phone numbers from documents or text sources efficiently.

name: Digital Signature Generator
description: Digital Signature Generator allows users to create handwritten-style signatures using drawing tools inside the browser. Users can draw signatures using a mouse or touchscreen and download the result as an image file. The tool runs entirely in the browser and does not upload signatures to servers. Generated signatures can be used in documents or forms where a digital signature image is required.

name: JSON Formatter
description: JSON Formatter formats JSON data into a readable structure with indentation and line breaks. Users paste JSON text and the tool organizes the data for easier reading and debugging. The formatting process runs locally in the browser and does not transmit data to external servers. The tool helps developers inspect and understand JSON structures quickly.

name: HTML Formatter
description: HTML Formatter organizes HTML code into a readable format by applying indentation and structured layout. Users paste HTML code and receive a formatted version that is easier to read and edit. The formatting process occurs locally inside the browser without transmitting code to servers. This tool helps developers clean and organize HTML markup for easier maintenance.

name: Text Paragraph Splitter
description: Text Paragraph Splitter divides long blocks of text into separate paragraphs automatically. Users paste text and the tool inserts paragraph breaks based on spacing or line structure. The processing runs locally in the browser and no data is transmitted to servers. This tool is useful for reorganizing large text blocks into readable paragraphs.
